description:
Tonbokiri and Nihongou arrive at the citadel and finally all three spears are together. A blue bird appears on the veranda and Nihongou is desperate to catch it for a certain reason. The three spears work together and chase after the blue bird. That night, Akita Toushirou sees a ghost and gets scared. Nikkari Aoe steps up to exterminate the ghost that lurks in the citadel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: August: The Formation of the Ghost Extermination Rangers!
葉月 幽霊退治戦隊, 結成!
